values.value: <Go To Developer Portal->Select the Applications tab->Select View secret for the application you registered for eCommerce InApp Alignment product->copy the Client Id here>
<Go To Developer Portal->Select the Applications tab->Select View secret for the application you registered for eCommerce InApp Alignment product->copy the Client secret here>
<Go To Developer Portal->Click on your name on top right->select profile->find subscription named DEFAULT_ACCESSTOKEN and copy the value from Primary key here>
<Go To Developer Portal->Select the Applications tab->Copy the Saleunit Serial Number from the application you registered for eCommerce InApp Alignment product here>
<Go To Developer Portal->Click on your name on top right->select profile->find subscription relevant to your eCommerce InApp Alignment Product and copy the Primary key here>
<Enter desired amount Integer value minimum 100 in Ã˜re>
<input the mobile number for the test app profile you have received or registered
<Input your callback URL here - this is where we will send the callback after user has confirmed payment>
<Input your fallback URL here - this is where the user will be redirected to after confirming mobile number>
<Input your shippingDetails URL here - this is where we will request shippingDetails>
<Input your consentRemoval URL here - this is where we will inform that the user has removed consent>
<This value will be overwritten when you call the Get Access Token API when having selected eCommerce v2 - MTE environment>
<This value will be overwritten on each Initiate Payment call with MSN + timestamp + random int>
